Bash(python3 -c "
import pandas as pd

# Load Kaplan-Meier survival curve
survival_full = pd.read_csv(''survival_curve_full_advanced.csv'')

print(''S(t) at key points:'')
print(f''S(1Y = 365d):   {survival_full.iloc[365][""S(t)""]:.4f}  ({survival_full.iloc[365][""S(t)""]*100:.2f}%)'')
print(f''S(2Y = 730d):   {survival_full.iloc[730][""S(t)""]:.4f}  ({survival_full.iloc[730][""S(t)""]*100:.2f}%)'')
print(f''S(3Y = 1095d):  {survival_full.iloc[1095][""S(t)""]:.4f}  ({survival_full.iloc[1095][""S(t)""]*100:.2f}%)'')
print(f''S(4Y = 1460d):  {survival_full.iloc[1460][""S(t)""]:.4f}  ({survival_full.iloc[1460][""S(t)""]*100:.2f}%)'')
print(f''S(5Y = 1825d):  {survival_full.iloc[1825][""S(t)""]:.4f}  ({survival_full.iloc[1825][""S(t)""]*100:.2f}%)'')

print(''\nMarginal decay (bucket allocations):'')
print(f''1Y bucket (9M-1Y): {(survival_full.iloc[270][""S(t)""] - survival_full.iloc[365][""S(t)""])*100:.2f}%'')
print(f''2Y bucket (1Y-2Y): {(survival_full.iloc[365][""S(t)""] - survival_full.iloc[730][""S(t)""])*100:.2f}%'')
print(f''3Y bucket (2Y-3Y): {(survival_full.iloc[730][""S(t)""] - survival_full.iloc[1095][""S(t)""])*100:.2f}%'')
print(f''4Y bucket (3Y-4Y): {(survival_full.iloc[1095][""S(t)""] - survival_full.iloc[1460][""S(t)""])*100:.2f}%'')
print(f''5Y bucket (4Y-5Y): {(survival_full.iloc[1460][""S(t)""] - survival_full.iloc[1825][""S(t)""])*100:.2f}%'')
")
